memberdef.name: InitBackground

briefdescription.para: This function initializes the various background images : acts like a constructor for the background struct.

parameterdescription.para: : a background object with the properties of the background struct
: velocity of the background moving in the x direction
: velocity of the background moving in the y direction

briefdescription.para: Initializes the speed at which the background moves.

briefdescription.para: Draws the background and makes sure it is always cycles through.
